availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel Higdon and Joanna Higdon. Married to Mary J. Layman Higdon. Father of Sarah A. Higdon and Mary T. Higdon. Farmer in Grayson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Grayson County in 1850. Farmer in Grayson County in 1860. Farmer in Grayson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky,

Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Grayson County, KY, July 1863, p. 18.
